articles.description: Playing protected content from services such as Netflix and Prime Video is now possible.
articles.content:
(Photo: Mozilla)
Firefox 85 rolled out for desktop users last week, and with it brought an end to Flash support. However, Mozilla also launched v85 for Android, and it added support for a feature al… [+1192 chars]
